Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.lucas.ticketsalesmanager.models.Event
public class Event extends Object
The Event class represents an event that has a name, description, date, and a list of available seats. It also contains the active state of the event, based on the current date.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Event

      public Event(String name, String description, Date date)
      Constructs a new Event with the provided name, description, and date. The event is marked as active if the date is after the current date.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the event.
      description - The description of the event.
      date - The date of the event.

      public boolean isActive()
